author: cooton
title: Informal sector asset tracker
description: Subsistence farmers and informal sector operators need proof of asset or goods  transfer and subsequent proof of asset ownership (PoAO)
solution: A phone Dapp using a photo image of the item with associated value.  Phone to phone asset transfer with an option for PoAO on a blockchain.
experience:
Retired entrepreneur having lived 46 years in Southern Africa to 2001 and thereafter Australia.
